caption: Love Love Love this restaurant. The food is amazing, The service is amazing, The staff is amazing. I can’t say anything bad about this restaurant other than it’s not open 24 hrs but that’s me wishing. Excellent place, check it out.

Food: 10/10 the pasta was a very large serving for ONLY TEN DOLLARS during lunch. Ordered the Carbonara and Rigatoni with spicy sausage. Flavorful, chewy, and filled with the right amount of meat and vegetables.  The interior decor was very nice and simple, yet also elegant. Would definitely come again!

First time eating indoors since covid and we had a great safe experiance. Congrats to the fumo team for their efforts to keep diners safe & comfortable. Food and service as always, wonderful! Drinks are 💣.
Lunch pasta is delicious, large portion for $10. Service and vibe are top notch.
Love the vegan pesto pasta and spicy calamari!
So delicious and they have an excellent pasta dish deal on Sundays/Mondays. Will definitely visit again. Recommend the rigatoni gamberi if you like shrimp!
Delicious food. Prompt service.
Very good
This was AMAZING. Got food for delivery on a busy Friday night and it came so fast and the food so SO SO GOOD! I am not even someone who writes reviews but this was so good I had to.
I had the vegan burger the burger was the best I've tasted. It melted in my mouth. The French fries were seasoned so well. Am glad I stopped in and tried it.

You just can’t go wrong here. They’ve got fantastic deals if you want to eat relatively cheap, and if you don’t care, you can trust that everything on the menu is high quality. We’ve had a few items in the 4 times we’ve gone, and never had an average meal. By far the most impressive was the vegan burger, which is incredibly easy (and common) to make mediocre because vegans “will eat anything.” These guys really knocked it out of the park, the best vegan burger we’ve ever had without a doubt. Can’t recommend this place enough.
Fabulous pizza. The chicken and waffles is not as most moist or flavorful as others.

The ziti, my good word. I swear they had an Italian grandmother in their restaurant with her own herb garden that freshly picked the ingredients. Paired this with the garlic bread! Oh my, my, I can write a love song about how amazing dinner was tonight! Thank you Fumo for bringing me your grandma into my life.

(Translated by Google) We made the order at home, the taste was good but there were many details that really upset me very much. The purchase receipt was inside the box with the pizza and the truth is not very hygienic. Second, in the photo you can see that the edge of the pizza is huge and its pizzas are already very small, so you are completely hungry :(  (Original) Hicimos el pedido a domicilio, el sabor bien pero hubo muchos detalles que la verdad me disgustaron muchísimo. El ticket de compra estaba adentro de la caja con la pizza y la verdad no se me hace muy higiénico. Segundo, en la foto se puede ver que la orilla de la pizza es enorme y ya de por sí sus pizzas son muy pequeñas, entonces de plano te quedas con hambre :(
some of the best Italian food my husband and i had! really phenomenal food. my husband even said so (and he's Italian)

Absolutely amazing food and service. Everything was delicious and staff constantly switched out our silverware and asking if everything was okay. Waiter was very knowledgeable and patient. Definitely will be visiting again. As a pervious reviewer said the outdoor dining seemed a little too close. The indoor in my opinion is more spaced out.
Good wine and great Italian food. My last name is Pellegrini so I would know
Amazing service and good food portion . So glad we came
Great italian food and servics near 110th St and Broadway

Food was pretty good, and the indoor dining was extremely spaced out, which was great. The outdoor dining however, was really way too close together to feel safe, even if it is "outdoor dining." we opted for inside which felt much safer. Also, the outdoor dining was really too cold in my opinion, even though it was so enclosed to lose the safety of "outdoor." However the staff was really accommodating and helpful.
PASTA TO DIE FOR. There’s no other way to put it. service is also very good as well

Their heating système is quite good. Though I was in for a quick snack, alone, the atmosphère was quite affable. I went for their Alcini, which the sauce was truly delicious. I, however the rice balls themselves were on the tiny side. I did appreciate that there didn't seem to have extra batter on them, though. All-in-all, with the sauce the were yummy.

Amazing food and drinks!!! Beautiful place. Very clean. Service was great. I love the set up they have now due to COVID. Tables are set up for social distancing with heating lamps. I got the shrimp pasta and my fiancé got the steak and fries. Must try!!

Had lunch here the other day.It was outside dining but they had heaters so it was warm. Food took a little while to come out but it was yummy. Their $10 lunch pasta is an amazing deal! Good portion size and price! I will definitely come back
This Place was FanF'ingtastic!   Awesome Food.  Great Outdoor Dining Setup with Heaters but dress appropriately.  Staff was EXCELLENT!  Highly Recommend You Go, tonight!
Great food overall the service was good and the people were nice. The chicken and baggie was a little dry other than that very recommended.
Very creative design. Amazing food!

I ordered food from here on Uber Eats. Ordered at 8:45. Arrived at 10:40 near Mott haven. All of the food was cold. Garlic bread was burnt and stale. Brick oven margherita pizza was cold as if it had been sitting at room temperature all day. Eggplant parmesan just went straight to the fridge since it didn't make any sense to eat. I wouldn't recommend this place. If you accept an order, there should be certain expectations for the food.
Good food!!

Fumo is one of my favorite restaurants on the Upper West Side and has been for well over a year now. They've adapted very well to the pandemic, and, as of November 2020, there are multiple tables for indoor dining (divided by plexiglass barriers), and the perimeter is heated for the tables outside. The cocktail menu is short, and absolutely delicious. The pizza is -very- good. Thin crust, perfectly cooked crust, and well portioned. Highly recommend the vodka pizza (yes, vodka sauce). The pasta dishes are classic recipes this restaurant does very well. AND THEY DELIVER. In my experience, actual delivery times are much better than advertised
Great food and service. The bread they used for my panini was exceptional. Lots of outdoor seating, with heat lamps in place for winter outdoor dining.
Overpriced
Delicious food.
Had dinner with a friend I hadn't seen in months. We had a lot to talk about and were not rushed.
The pasta with shrimp was amazing. I also loved the drink called Gladys.

Went for dinner the other night and everything came out great. Definitely recommend going when they have their pasta specials for ONLY $10! The wait staff is so friendly and the waiters/waitresses make it feel like a second home! Their brunch is so good especially their French toast! 10/10 for this wonderful place!
Spaghetti Funghi is the BEST pasta in NYC  ever! The smell of truffle oil and the creamy sauce always made me mouthwatering! I can have spaghetti funghi every week. I’ll always go back for this ❤️
My favorite pasta I’ve had in a very long time! I order the Rigatone Gamberi (shrimp, mozz  and broccoli in pink sauce). The waitstaff is absurdly kind and attentive. All in all very good experience.
I think the food is very meh, but its a good ratio of value for money. Especially in lunch, the $10 pastas are totally worth it.

If you like deep dish pizza covered with marinara sauce you have to try this place out!  We had to wait for a hour to get a able but you can preorder your pizza so your not waiting for another 45 minutes after you sit down.  Btw: I read great reviews on the garlic bread and had to try it myself but beware its more like DIY garlic bread! They give you French bread/ butter/ cloves of soft garlic! It was good but next time I think I will just go for a extra slice of pizza!
Love everything about this place. The food, staff and ambiance is great. All their pasta is absolutely delicious. My go-to is the Penne alla vodka or the Chicken Parm

Good food and well priced for a stylish neighborhood place with a creative brunch menu. Go for the Lox pizza or avocado toast. Boys had pasta with salmon and scallions and a smoked salmon eggs benedict. They have done a really nice job social distancing their tables within a plant-covered fence.
Amazing food and service. Perfect location.
I had the Penne and Added Meat Balls. The food was very good. The only reason for not 5 starts is because of portion size. Pasta was tasty and would eat here again!
The staff is friendly and try to accommodate as much as they can.

These folks rock! My second COVID-outdoor visit for dinner, and it was even better than the first. The first was great (eggplant parmesan and sauteed spinach). The second (a shared spinach again, b/c it was soon good) and chicken marsala with mushrooms, and grilled asparagus. Wow, wow, wow!  Incredibly delish (or I wouldn't bother writing this!). And generous enough portions that I brought half my dinner home. My friend had the snapper special, and it too was quite special (which I know b/c I tasted it). The glass of Sauvignon blanc was delish and service was great as well. Food was OUTSTANDING and GENEROUS, and, for the product we got, the price was quite right. Long live FUMO UWS.
Delicious! Highly recommend the chef's specials.  I've been here twice and both times were exceptional! Highly recommend reservations.

Fumo does the simple things really, really. For example, the Caesar Salad - though typically the same in all restaurants - had the perfect level of dressing and flavor. Same with the penne and pizzas. Overall a great meal for its price!
Good quality Italian, nice and appealing neighborhood place.
Would certainly recommend eating here. Exceptional ambience, fresh dishes, great service. They never disappoint.
Love this place. Happy hour deals are great for dining in. Delivery is super fast. Food is delicious!

Easy becoming one of my favorite places in the city. From the food to the service. Delivery or pickup. This place is very good, and friendly stuff. Lunch specials. Fav dish - Kale Salad, tied with the chicken Parmesan. Yum!
sidewalk tables open now in extended sidewalk space. super nice. pizza was great!

Always a good time and great meal!   Pasta is always fresh and the drinks are always strong... my kind of place!  Staff is always kind and they treat their customers very well. The back room is a perfect spot for a birthday celebration or a good time with friends, drinks, and fresh Italian eats!!! One of my neighborhood favorite s hands down!!!!
YOUR BAKE ZITI CHICKEN CUTLET AND VODKA SAUCE IS THE BEST EVER WE HAD TRIED. U GUYS ARE BETTER THAN GIOVANIS HERE IN THE BRONX.  👏👏👏👏👏👏👏👏👏👏👏👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👊👊👊👊👊👊👊👊🤝🤝🤝🤝🤝🤝
Great and kind staff with delicious food.  Celiac friendly.
Niece place for lunch

Great artisanal pizza. Had the kale and multi-cheese, and everything about it was enjoyable; the dough was high quality, the kale and cheeses were plentiful and fresh. The Upper West Side has a few places that offer artisanal pizzas, but this place is the best by far.

Excellent restaurant! The food is always delicious and fresh. I love the pizzas and my wife loves the salads. The gluten free options are also amazing. Yet, the customer service is beyond phenomenal, an issue once through Grubhub was corrected beyond any expectation. They are now our go to restaurant anytime, and as far as I am concerned, they will always have a home in the UWS with us.
Fumo has become a family fave especially with the $10 pasta special. The staff there are warm and welcoming.
Baked clams n penne a la vodka
Nice place to take some pizza

Fumo has a great ambiance. I got a drink with mezcal, it was absolutely wonderful. My boyfriend had a problem with his dish they were really understanding and fixed the problem immediately. I have been here multiple times and loved all the dishes and cocktails I have had.
Not a bad Italian place, but nothing to write home about, in my opinion.pizza is quite good, but the pasta dishes lack pezzaz.
Food is okay. Shrimps were not fresh.
Food was delicious service was superb
Great bloody Mary
Great food, fast service and the pasta lunch special is a great deal!

A relatively new come to this area but fits right in!! Delicious italian food in a very cool vibe, and casual to romantic lighting. Friendly staff and a beautiful bar area. A big group area if needed and great place for people watching, you'll probably be to busy eating though.  The pizza is ridiculously good and fresh  great for sharing. ( Gluten free and wheat options and non dairy ootions)and the variety of pasta dishes is plentiful. ( Sundays $10 all pasta is a great family idea) The chicken marsala is very very good. ( A favorite,) You must save room for the tiramisu...addictive! Enjoy!
Great addition to the neighborhood!
Great place for lunch. Service was quick and friendly.

We celebrated the wedding of two beautiful souls at Fumo UWS last night and the restaurant was the perfect backdrop for the night. The staff, management, servers and chefs did a wonderful job. The family style service kept everyone pleasantly fulfilled with great Italian fare and the freshest flavors. Will be back there for dinner. Also the espresso was excellent!!!
Their Sunday night $10 pasta bowls are a good deal. Otherwise a little pricey for what you get.
Great food and service

Really good food, but was asked to clear our table during the dinner shift for other customers. We were offered bar seating, but just headed out instead. Good atmosphere, a little small. Good for date night.

PRIVATE PARTY - executed flawlessly.In November we held a private party at FUMO for about 40 guests.  Like any other host we were nervous and wanted everything to be flawless. We were EXCEPTIONALLY pleased with the care and attention the owner Piero of FUMO gave to our event.  The room was ready on time and set up perfectly. The appetizers came out on time hot and delicious, spicy calamari, a choice of pizza’s, and rice balls.  They generously kept the drinks flowing as the staff was very attentive.  Our first course included two salad and pasta. The main course Salmon and Chicken Marsala.  The owner made the great suggestion that everything be served family style so no one had to choose and could eat everything. It was the RIGHT DECISION.  THERE WAS SO MUCH FOOD – and it was ABSOLUTELY DELICIOUS.  We received SO many compliments on the food.  The team worked very well together and handled several special requests (for vegans and vegetarians). The space is PERFECT for a private event up to 60 people (they have a side room).  Bright and airy – and brand new it leant towards a good feeling for all. Our guests left smiling and we felt we got REAL VALUE.  I would highly recommend for a private event.
Stuck for a new spot when visiting UWS, since Henry's closed. Pleasantly surprised by this reincarnation of this spot. Good food very good service with reasonable prices.

I don’t know why the reviewers are raving this place. This is such a mediocre place. Especially in New York where food standards are especially high. I had pasta and barely had the half.the marinara sauce had a heavy burnt garlic taste and the noodles were overcooked... i would not recommend this place, ever.
Great service!! Tasty variety of pastas& $10 before 4pm & great happy hour starting @4pm Must try the Meatballs & fried Mozzarella & best thin crust woodfired pizza on UWS

Excellent food for the price point! Service is great, drinks are delightful, and the ambiance is sleek and sophisticated. Great place for groups (they have a beautiful party space) or just a friendly date night.
Great food. Bar. Really good pizza!
This is a total neighborhood Italian.  It's folks from the neighborhood taking care of folks from the neighborhood.  They're super fun, reasonably priced, and the food is good.

Excellent pizza selection. I would especially highlight the margherita and funghi pizzas. For brunch, I find the waffle in the chicken + waffle dish is a bit too sweet. But otherwise everything here is pretty delicious and at decent prices.
Great local Italian restaurant
Food is wonderful service is wonderful the places very nice love it
Spacious dining room visible from the street, friendly and helpful wait staff, a variety of dishes and sides on both brunch and dinner menus, no reservation required.
This is an ok place, prices are a bit too high for the quality of the food!
Good food and drinks. Their salads are well balanced, with a good mix of fresh ingredients and greens.  The drinks are well made, and I recommend the Caroline.
Italian menu with full bar selection
Adequate portions, good service, lively / noisy atmosphere.
Great food and team
Awesome food and Great service and good prices
ordered delivery. a bit expensive but very good and quick to come. got asparagus and spaghetti with mushrooms, marsala cream sauce and white truffle oil. would order again
Such a delicious lunch we enjoyed there on Wednesday!
NEVER Visited
(Translated by Google) Nice place for friends to meet  (Original) Agradable lugar para reunion de amigos
Delicious.  Good service!
Good food

A nice place that was recommended by a friend. Lovey atmosphere and the service was great. The beef bolognese was very good along with the thin crust white pizza we had. The prices were reasonable. It can get busy so it's best to reserve a table. Lovely place
Fumo Upper West Side
Nice little Italian place right by Columbia University. Great food, great service. Well priced meals. $10 pasta special on Sunday evenings.

I visited this place 3 times and really like it. Yaaasss pizza for life. I love the brick oven pizza. Really well done. I love personal pizzas with fresh ingredients made live before my eyes. I try the happy hr once and it was pretty good deal of beer and wine. I spent only $30 for 5 drinks and they were quality drinks.  For dinner i had a pizza it was a no brainer for me on my first time. Ill try the pastas next. I ve seen guests i m chatting with at the bar indulge on the pasta like there was no tomorrow lol so i assume its good.  The decor and ambience is very cozy. I like the dimmed candle lights and glass walls that makes it opened and a lots of plants give it that greenhouse atrium like feel. I get the old italian brasserie like mix with fresh breezy airy warm tropical and romantic Mediterranean feel. Really. Perfect for dates, meeting with parents and hang out with friends for a nice meal and drinks at the table.  Looking forward to trying your menu and special in the future.  Xo

This place is AMAZING!!!! The ambiance is great, staff is very friendly they have a very good layout, giving all guests just enough space. I love the menu, it is simple offering a nice verity of freshly prepared authentic Italian food. The appetizers-rice balls, spicy calamari, eggplant parm, are so delicious. The sauce tastes homemade, the bread is authentic Italian with perfect crust. Salads are great I personally love the baby kale Cesar salad. Main courses are all good, We love the steak and how it is prepared, chicken Marsala is the best we ever had because the mushrooms are fresh and have such a wonderful aroma. On weekend, brunch is a must, the chicken and waffles are so so good we actually talk about it at home, I also enjoy the avocado toast, but man ohhhhh man, chicken and waffles are da bomb! Pasta is always fresh and al dente, bolognese tastes so so good. All desserts are on point. I love Fumo, my family loves Fumo, we dine here every week and I hope we will for many years to come.
Really great food. Awesome addition to the neighborhood. Friendly staff, kids friendly, dishes are great and reasonable prices.
Excellent ambience, service, and food. This area needed a good Italian place and finally has one. Get the Roni Pizza for something spicy! If the scallops are on special, they are a must get!

This was a really nice place. I would give it 5 stars if it had better tables. The atmosphere. The atmosphere was great! Fumo had a lovely atmosphere that made me feel like I was in a real restaurant. But people in the restaurant were not loud, neither was the music. The service was lovely. It really stood out because the waiter that I had was cheerful and friendly, and he really explained the dishes in a good way that really stood out to me. Now on to the food. The food was really good. I had the meatballs and some pizza, and both were delicious. The meatballs tasted like meatballs that I would get from a really good Italian restaurant. The sauce around them was also really good. There were I believe 4 or 5 meatballs in the bowl. The pizza tasted really good. It was warm, and had an equal amount of cheese and tomato sauce. It was a Neapolitan pizza pie, and it was really good. The Shirley Temple tasted like the Shirley Temple at Cafe Du Soleil. Sweet. Really sweet. The tables were not good. They were very slippery. Someone should fix the tables there. The price was pretty good for the quality of the food. The price of one dish goes from $12-25$. That is pretty good.
